text: The dihydropyrimidinase mutants (H59A, H61A, K150A, Y155A, H183A, H239A, S289A, D316A, and N337A) were generated according to the manufacturer's protocol (Stratagene, LaJolla, CA). The presence of the mutation was verified by DNA sequencing in each construct. The oligonucleotide primers for the preparation of mutants are shown in Table 1 .
